body: Operating Systems overview and principles; processes and signals; concurrency and synchronization; memory and file management; client-server computing; scripts; systems-programming.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC122 ; CMPSC312)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 474: Operating System & Systems Programming
